name: Farmer's Bargain
description:
👨🏾‍🌾 **Controls:  Click "Ready to start" to begin the game. Use WASD or click the ground to move. Walk up to farmers to interact. Click the buttons to respond to and make offers, and click the little arrows to ask for/counteroffer different things. Tap the 🔁 button in the top right to restart.**

This is a prototype/demo for a general negotiation system I'm working on!

You'll start out with a random inventory of items and be given a goal to get 3 particular items from the other farmers.

Use what you have to trade with the others and try to ultimately acquire your goal items!

It may be helpful to sit back and observe for a while to figure out who likes what, or just dive in and see what they're willing to trade. Sometimes, they might come up to you with a request, too. Everyone has their own preferences!

Made with pygame, compiled with pygbag
Credit to eevee for a perlin noise implementation

Thanks to Prof. Adam Smith for motivating me to make this demo!
